title: Discover the Top 10 Emission Reduction Technology Trends in 2023 - StartUs Insights
summary: This article summarizes the top 10 global emission reduction technology trends in 2023, based on an analysis of 1680 startups and scaleups. The trends include carbon offsetting, artificial intelligence, electrification, green hydrogen, carbon capture, utilization, and storage, energy-efficient integrations, big data, waste valorization, bio-based fuels & polymers, and emission monitoring. These trends are driven by the need to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and combat climate change.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article describes innovations that contribute to environmental sustainability goals, such as reducing carbon emissions, replacing harmful substances, and reducing resource consumption.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article describes new or improved products or processes that differ significantly from the firm's previous products or processes and that have been introduced on the market or brought into use by the firm.
green_product: TRUE. The article describes products that are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle.
green_process: TRUE. The article describes processes that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: ['334413 - Semiconductor and Related Device Manufacturing', '541712 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences', '541990 - All Other Professional, Scientific, and Technical Services', '325199 - All Other Basic Organic Chemical Manufacturing']
greenwashing: The article does not provide any information about greenwashing, so it is not possible to determine whether the described innovations are examples of greenwashing.
